snippet.title: Arcade Game: Time Pilot (1982 Konami)
snippet.description:
A field shooting 'em up game where the player controls his plane with the 8 way joystick and shoots at the enemies using the Fire button.

Note: Invincibility cheat used after down to last life. The game has like 7 levels and endlessly restarts at level 1 so the game is endless until all lives are lost.
